installWeb3MobileBrowser: Пожалуйста, откройте в браузере с поддержкой web3, таком, как Trust Wallet или Coinbase Wallet.
installMetamask: Пожалуйста, откройте в Chrome или Brave с установленным расширением Metamask.
betaWarning: Проект находится на стадии бета тестирования.
searchOrPaste: Поиск токена или вставить адрес токена
itWillCost: В крайнем случае это будет стоить
noRecipient: Введите адрес кошелька эфира, куда перечислить.
invalidRecipient: Пожалуйста, введите корректный адрес кошелька получателя.
mustBeETH: Одно из значений должно быть BNB.
enterCurrencyOrLabelCont: Введите {{ inputCurrency }} или {{ label }}, чтобы продолжить.
tokenWorth: При текущем курсе, каждый токен пула оценивается в
initialExchangeRate: Начальный курс обмена будет установлен согласно вашим депозитам. Убедитесь, что ваши депозиты ETH и {{ label }} имеют одинаковое значение в валюте.
label: Название
brokenToken: The selected token is not compatible with BSCswap. Adding liquidity will result in locked funds.
toleranceExplanation: Lowering this limit decreases your risk of frontrunning. However, this makes more likely that your transaction will fail due to normal price movements.
connectToViewLiquidity: Connect to a wallet to view your liquidity.
expertModeTips1: Expert mode turns off the confirm transaction prompt and allows high slippage trades that often result in bad rates and lost funds.
expertModeTips2: ONLY USE THIS MODE IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.
dontseeapoolyoujoined: Don't see a pool you joined?
usethistool: Use this tool to find pairs that don't automatically appear in the interface.
whenyouaddliquidity: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
removingpooltokens: Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.
whenyouaddtokenliquidity: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens that represent your share. If you don’t see a pool you joined in this list, try importing a pool below.
connectToFind: Connect to a wallet to find pools
selectToFind: Select a token to find your liquidity.
findAToken: Find a token by searching for its name or symbol or by pasting its address below.
importAnyToken: Import any token into your list by pasting the token address into the search field.
commonlyPaired: These tokens are commonly paired with other tokens.
outputIsEstimated: Output is estimated. If the price changes by more than
youAreTheFirst: You are the first liquidity provider.
theRatioOfTokens: The ratio of tokens you add will set the price of this pool.
onceYouAreHappy: Once you are happy with the rate click supply to review.
yourTXWill: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.
yourTXWill2: Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this long.
yourTXWill3: Your transaction will revert if there is a large, unfavorable price movement before it is confirmed.
theDifference: The difference between the market price and estimated price due to trade size.
aPortion: A portion of each trade (0.30%) goes to liquidity providers as a protocol incentive.
routingThrough: Routing through these tokens resulted in the best price for your trade.
